Welcome to BURGR
Nice To Meet You
What do we do?

What we do

at burgr

Gather

We meet regularly once a month, and hold bi-monthly "hack" meetups at The Edge

Create

We create and contribute to the statistical programming language, R, which is Free and Open Source

Disseminate

We share and disseminate the knowledge at the burgr group through out github repo, for others to see and care about

About

burgr = Brisbane Users of R Group

  • April 2016

    The name

    We were born out of the first Australian rOpenSci Unconference, help in Brisbane in April 2016. It is unknown where the name first originated, but it is a simple rearrangement of the standard R user group acronym.
